description.displayText: I hired Mariah to help with my two boys (7, 2 y/o) on Saturday afternoons. She's worked with us for 10 months and it's been a pleasure and relief to have her consistent help on weekends. Mariah is a warm and responsible babysitter who is very safety-minded, she engages both boys in conversation, arts and crafts projects and games. She is incredibly patient, calm and consistent and doesn't get frazzled one bit even when both boys are wild with extra bursts of energy and/or loud with frustration. She's a great role model for them and she meets the boys on their level of play and conversation. She also helps with preparing meals, transportation, and bathing. She still works with us and hope that continues for a long time!

description.displayText: Mariah is sent from the heavens! From the logistical side (calls, coordinating, planning, communications and implementing), to the actual caretaker for my three "wild child's! " I, along with my kids, were out of our element and Mariah provided great relief for many hours on three separate occasions. She asked the right questions, took great responsibility and just made things easier for all of us. I HIGHLY recommend Mariah for all perspectives of childcare.

description.displayText: Mariah was great! My son really liked her. She knows how interact well with little ones. She's the only babysitter who proactively asked questions and took notes on how to care for my toddler.
description.originalText: Mariah was great! My son really liked her. She knows how interact well with little ones. She's the only babysitter who proactively asked questions and took notes on how to care for my toddler.

description.displayText: Mariah was a great sitter.  It was a short notice job and she  was so sweet!  She developed a rapport quickly, did homework, and sort out engaging activities.  I was very happy with her service and will hire her again.
description.originalText: Mariah was a great sitter.  It was a short notice job and she  was so sweet!  She developed a rapport quickly, did homework, and sort out engaging activities.  I was very happy with her service and will hire her again.

description.displayText:
Mariah is very professional as well as reliable. I highly recommend her for any childcare positions.
Regards,
Nedjyne
